mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHIPMENT (ID, TRADEID, TYPE, SPLITID, OPERATETYPE, MERGEDID, QUANTITY, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSERID, CREATEIP) VALUES (#{id}, #{tradeId}, #{type}, #{splitId}, #{operateType}, #{mergedId}, #{quantity}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId}, #{createIp})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, TRADEID, TYPE, SPLITID, OPERATETYPE, MERGEDID, QUANTITY, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSERID, CREATEIP FROM SHIPMENT

SELECT ID, TRADEID, TYPE, SPLITID, OPERATETYPE, MERGEDID, QUANTITY, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSERID, CREATEIP FROM SHIPMENT WHERE ID IN
#{item}
SELECT ID, TRADEID, TYPE, SPLITID, OPERATETYPE, MERGEDID, QUANTITY, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSERID, CREATEIP FROM SHIPMENT WHERE TRADEID = #{tradeId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ID, TRADEID, TYPE, SPLITID, OPERATETYPE, MERGEDID, QUANTITY, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSERID, CREATEIP FROM SHIPMENT WHERE SPLITID = #{splitId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TYPE = 2
SELECT ID, TRADEID, TYPE, SPLITID, OPERATETYPE, MERGEDID, QUANTITY, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSERID, CREATEIP FROM SHIPMENT WHERE MERGEDID = #{mergedId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND OPERATETYPE = 2
SELECT ID, TRADEID, TYPE, SPLITID, OPERATETYPE, MERGEDID, QUANTITY, CREATEDATE, CREATEUSERID, CREATEIP FROM SHIPMENT WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
